blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Yo waddup llamarmy? Heard our lad Dan Is Not On Fire is off snacking on some Maltesers with Delia Smith, hope he doesn't slip on...
question: Yo waddup llamarmy? Heard our lad Dan Is Not On Fire is off snacking on some Maltesers with Delia Smith, hope he doesn't slip on a placenta lolzor, RAWR xD

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: i miss dan... :( miss his face, his voice, his thoughts, all of him. if he came back soon that would be wonderful. obviously my...
question: i miss dan... :( miss his face, his voice, his thoughts, all of him. if he came back soon that would be wonderful. obviously my life still goes on but i miss having a little sprinkle of dan in it. he's a good egg.
answer: He’ll be back. When, and for how long, I can’t tell you.

reblog.comment: He’ll be back. When, and for how long, I can’t tell you.

trail.content_raw: He’ll be back. When, and for how long, I can’t tell you.
trail.content: He’ll be back. When, and for how long, I can’t tell you.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: If being tired of all the shit this fandom pulls and the way people treat those who don’t agree with their Truth makes you a...
question: If being tired of all the shit this fandom pulls and the way people treat those who don’t agree with their Truth makes you a sketchy person, then hell yeah I’m one shit stirring super sketchy gal. Anyway, I really miss Dan. During this break I’ve discovered that I can live without him, but I certainly prefer to be able to witness his existence on my laptop/phone screen weekly.
answer: I have forgotten what he looks like and at this point, only Phil exists in my mind.

reblog.comment: I have forgotten what he looks like and at this point, only Phil exists in my mind.

trail.content_raw: I have forgotten what he looks like and at this point, only Phil exists in my mind.
trail.content: I have forgotten what he looks like and at this point, only Phil exists in my mind.

blog.name: totalphillie
blog.title: hits different
blog.description: julia | 16 | she/herdid u know i’m a phillie?

title: 12th of February
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2SaZb6o

by BeeAreEff

This fic is based on the book and movie before I fall.

Dan Howell is a popular boy with everything he could want in life, but what happens when that suddenly all changes. His life starts going in a loop reliving the same day over and over again, his once favorite day becomes his enemy and he doesn’t know how to fix it, but is there someone that can help him?

Words: 899, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester, PJ Liguori, Chris Kendall, Louise Pentland
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Dan Howell and Phil Lester Are Teenagers, Valentine’s Day, Fluff and Angst, Hurt/Comfort, Strangers to Lovers


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2SaZb6o
